name: Cross Tile #1: A new take on Crossword Puzzles
name_original: Cross Tile #1: A new take on Crossword Puzzles
description:
Drag-n-drop solution tiles into place to solve this crossword. You can solve this like a traditional crossword puzzle, manipulate tiles to form words, or combine the two techniques. By default, correct tiles are highlighted although you can turn them off.

If you like this puzzle, check out our book Word Puzzles Reimagined on Amazon.
